person.name: Nguyen Duy Minh
person.summary: Aspiring AI Engineer with solid expertise in developing, fine-tuning, and deploying AI models, including Large Language Models (LLMs). With hands-on experience in both academic and professional settings, I have successfully contributed to AI projects involving model optimization, backend development, and chatbot implementation, eager to contribute my capabilities to innovative AI-driven projects.
person.location: Vinhomes Grand Park, 9 Districts, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

responsibilities: Contributed to the design LLM system and implementation of a RAG chatbot for company customer support.
Led the development of a robust backend for POCY, an application designed to detect scam/spam activities.
Data collection and preprocessing efforts, using advanced data crawling techniques to build datasets for predicting outcomes in Euro football matches.

work_experience.work_place: Amazing Technology and Solution Company Limited
responsibilities: Engineered and implemented a facial tracking and tracing module, improving real-time monitoring capabilities.

list_project.name: Customer Care Chatbot
list_project.description: Augmented model inputs by integrating access to external data sources, implemented vector-based storage for efficient retrieval of relevant information, improving the chatbot's contextual understanding and response accuracy.

list_project.name: POCY Project
list_project.description: Preprocessing of SMS and call data to prepare datasets for analysis and model training.
